item.title: Trump wants to punish flag burning. Is burning the American flag illegal?
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order that seeks to go after people who burn the American flag.

item.title: What happens if you can't pay a reverse mortgage? 3 things to know
item.description: Can't keep up with your reverse mortgage costs? Here's what could happen — and how you can protect your home.

item.title: Why Cracker Barrel's new logo is a flop, according to branding experts
item.description: Cracker Barrel badly misread its own customer base — and our culturally sensitive times — in trying to spruce up its image, experts say.
